summary: more than 22,000 people have left huepetuhe since the government halted gasoline shipments in april .   government sent troops to destroy heavy machinery used in mining that it deemed illegal .   about 3,000 people remain in the town . ` the economy has collapsed , ' says mayor marco ortega .
